name: dash-cytoscape
description: A Component Library for Dash aimed at facilitating network visualization in Python, wrapped around Cytoscape.js

scripts.lint.flake8: flake8 --max-line-length=100 usage.py usage-advanced.py usage-elements.py usage-events.py usage-stylesheet.py demos tests
scripts.lint.pylint: pylint usage.py usage-advanced.py usage-elements.py usage-events.py usage-stylesheet.py demos tests
scripts.lint.black: node -e "if ((process.env.PYVERSION || 'python39') !== 'python36'){process.exit(1)} " || black --check dash_cytoscape/ tests/ setup.py usage-advanced.py usage-elements.py usage-events.py usage-stylesheet.py usage.py
scripts.format.black: black dash_cytoscape/ tests/ setup.py usage-advanced.py usage-elements.py usage-events.py usage-stylesheet.py usage.py
scripts.format: npm run format.eslint && npm run format.prettier && npm run format.black
scripts.lint:js: npm run lint.eslint && npm run lint.prettier
scripts.lint:python: npm run lint.flake8 && npm run lint.pylint && npm run lint.black
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:python && npm run lint:js
scripts.build:js-all: npm run build:js && npm run build:js-dev && npm run build:js-dev-extra && npm run build:js-extra
scripts.build:all: npm run build:js-all && npm run build:backends

author: The Plotly Team <cytoscape@plotly.com>
